DataElement.preferredName: Total Lesion Contrast Enhanced PET-CT Scan Percent Change From Baseline Percentage Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numerical response that indicates the percentage change of total lesion contrast enhanced PET-CT scan as compared at some baseline event or timepoint.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Total Lesion Contrast Enhanced PET-CT Scan Percent Change From Baseline
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part._A form of PET/CT imaging in which radiopharmaceuticals is either ingested or injected intravenously in an attempt to enhance the collected images for diagnostic purposes._The value of the last measurement taken divided by the initial value taken at some baseline event or timepoint.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Total Lesion Contrast Enhanced PET-CT Scan
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.:A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.:A form of PET/CT imaging in which radiopharmaceuticals is either ingested or injected intravenously in an attempt to enhance the collected images for diagnostic purposes.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.
A form of PET/CT imaging in which radiopharmaceuticals is either ingested or injected intravenously in an attempt to enhance the collected images for diagnostic purposes.

Property.preferredDefinition: The value of the last measurement taken divided by the initial value taken at some baseline event or timepoint.

Concepts.definition: The value of the last measurement taken divided by the initial value taken at some baseline event or timepoint.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
